author: apfeiffer1
body:
This is a backport of accumulated fixes from 7.5/7.6 for conditions tool and lib (conddb and conddblib) to make the tools working correctly in the 7.4 series used in online. 
This needs the cmsdist PR #1623 which is already merged, AFAICT.
title: backport of accumulated fixes from 7.5/7.6 for conditions tool and lib
